helpText: Ĳ_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ä.

generic.title: Ĳ_Error updating categories__________________________ä
generic.message: Ĳ_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ä.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Ĳ_Error updating categories__________________________ä
maxDepthExceeded.message: Ĳ_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ä.

destinationHasSameName.title: Ĳ_Error updating categories__________________________ä
destinationHasSameName.message: Ĳ_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ä.

noSchema.title: Ĳ_Schema not found_________________ä
noSchema.message: Ĳ_Item schema not found for user_________________ä.

maxCharacter.title: Ĳ_Error updating categories__________________________ä
maxCharacter.message: Ĳ_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ä.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Ĳ_Delete category________________ä
deleteInUseCategory.message: Ĳ_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ä.

custom.title: Ĳ_Custom categories__________________ä
custom.message: Ĳ_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ä.

arcgis.title: Ĳ_ArcGIS categories__________________ä
arcgis.message: Ĳ_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ä.

iso.title: Ĳ_ISO categories_______________ä
iso.message: Ĳ_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ä.

inspire.title: Ĳ_INSPIRE categories___________________ä
inspire.message: Ĳ_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ä.
